definition: background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base

sentences.english: Many high-gain stations will be deployed on land and ocean bottom.
sentences.chinese: 在陆地和洋底要设置许多高增益的台站。

sentences.english: Recent ocean floor data confirm the first part of this slow process.
sentences.chinese: 近来洋底资料证实了这一缓慢过程的第一部分。

sentences.english: One of the longest mountain ranges of the world rises from the floor of the Atlantic.
sentences.chinese: 世界上最长的山脉之一就是从大西洋的洋底升起来的。

sentences.english: The submarine bottomed to observe the ocean floor.
sentences.chinese: 潜艇潜入海底观察洋底。

sentences.english: The floor of the Atlantic ridges in the middle from north to south.
sentences.chinese: 大西洋洋底在中部形成由北向南的海脊。

sentences.english: The ocean floor is colored to reflect the terrain features of the sub-sea surface.
sentences.chinese: 洋底是色，以反映地形小组海面。

sentences.english: Amphioxus body by the rapid movement and drilling holes in the ocean floor.
sentences.chinese: 文昌鱼藉身体的迅速运动而在洋底钻洞。

sentences.english: They differ somewhat from bathymetric charts which are virtually topographic maps of the ocean floor.
sentences.chinese: 们与水深图稍有不同，后者实际上是洋底地形图。

sentences.english: The island is huge fissure eruption of adjacent formation volcanic island.
sentences.chinese: 各岛是从洋底巨大裂隙喷发形成的火山岛。

pinyin: Ma3 li3 ya4 na4 Hai3 gou1
